title: Christmas Santa - Watch Face
summary: Christmas Santa Claus Gear Watch Face.
description: Unique Christmas Santa Claus Gear Watch Face. ★ Beautiful Gear Christmas theme Clockface, designed by RR (Rose & Rebecca Design). ★ Theme: Christmas ★ More designs, themes and colors coming soon! ★ Compatible watches: LG G Watch, Samsung Gear LiveWatch face will show up on your watch automatically. If it doesn't show up please go to the android wear app > Settings and Resync all apps.*** Please contact me directly if you have any questions about this watch face before giving a bad rating. Thanks!
descriptionHTML:
Unique Christmas Santa Claus Gear Watch Face.



★ Beautiful Gear Christmas theme Clockface, designed by RR (Rose & Rebecca Design).

★ Theme: Christmas

★ More designs, themes and colors coming soon!

★ Compatible watches: LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live



Watch face will show up on your watch automatically. If it doesn't show up please go to the android wear app > Settings and Resync all apps.



*** Please contact me directly if you have any questions about this watch face before giving a bad rating. Thanks!
comments: Do not buy does not work Tried twice to install. Don't waste your time. This app is a scam. Did not get my money back.
